name: TaskUnite Inc.
description: Developer of AI algorithms tools intended to increase efficiency in healthcare systems and services. The company's tools provide workflow tasks, account for inventory used during patient-related tasks, and provide feedback to team members, enabling healthcare companies to promote safety and hospitals to improve quality and track inventory and supply chains.
